faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have questions about Cross Designs? Find answers here.

items.title: How does Cross Designs' AI generation work?
items.description: Simply describe your desired cross style and elements, and our AI technology will generate a beautiful, customized cross design based on your input.

items.title: What styles of crosses can I create?
items.description: You can create various styles including traditional, modern, Celtic, Orthodox, minimalist, and decorative crosses. Our AI understands different cultural and religious design elements.

items.title: What file formats are available for download?
items.description: Cross Designs provides high-resolution PNG, JPG, and SVG formats, suitable for both digital use and physical printing.

items.title: Can I customize the colors and patterns?
items.description: Yes! You can fully customize colors, patterns, decorative elements, and proportions to create your perfect cross design.

items.title: How many designs can I generate?
items.description: The number of designs depends on your subscription plan. Free users get 10 designs, while paid plans offer more or unlimited generations.

items.title: Can I modify designs after generation?
items.description: Yes! You can refine any generated design by adjusting colors, adding elements, or requesting variations through our AI system.
